title: System time, local time, and time zone setting
name: LGF_SetTime
description: This block combines the functions of system time, local time, and set time zone.

input.name: systemTime
input.description: System time to be set in PLC

input.name: isLocalTime
input.description: TRUE: `systemTime` is local time, FALSE: `systemTime` is UTC time

input.name: isDaylightSavingTime
input.description: Daylight saving time changeover, TRUE: activated, FALSE: deactivated

output.name: done
output.description: TRUE: Commanded functionality has been completed successfully

output.name: busy
output.description: TRUE: FB is active and new output values can be expected

output.name: error
output.description: FALSE: No error / TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: lastSetTimeZone
output.description: Time zone that was set last by this block

output.name: status
output.description: 16#0000-16#7FFF: Status of the FB / 16#8000-16#FFFF: Error identification

output.name: subFunctionStatus
output.description: Status or return value of called FB's, FC's and system blocks
